## subTasks.Api interface

Entry point for task to Smokeball.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
interface Api 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [all(taskId)](./smokeball-client-sdk.subtasks.api.all.md) | Gets the subTasks associated with the specified task id. |
|  [create(request)](./smokeball-client-sdk.subtasks.api.create.md) | Creates a new subTask for the specified task id and returns the newly created subTask. |
|  [delete(id, taskId)](./smokeball-client-sdk.subtasks.api.delete.md) | Marks subTask with the specified id and parent task id as deleted and returns the deleted subTask. |
|  [get(id, taskId)](./smokeball-client-sdk.subtasks.api.get.md) | Gets the subTask associated with the specified id and parent task id. |
|  [update(request)](./smokeball-client-sdk.subtasks.api.update.md) | Updates a subTask with the specified id and returns the updated subTask. |
